channel.title: Cybersecurity on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on FinanClub

item.title: FTNT
item.description: score:159 Chances: Fortinet has caught the eye of investors, indicating potential investment opportunities. The company won Google Cloud Technology Partner of the Year Award for Security, showcasing its capabilities. Fortinet expands its SASE solution to provide cloud-delivered enterprise-grade protection, positioning itself for growth.

item.title: VZ
item.description: score:23 Chances: Verizon increases dividend for the 17th consecutive year, indicating a strong commitment to dividend payments. Verizon launches new technologies and connectivity solutions, potentially expanding its customer base. The company extends partnerships with the NFL and MetLife Stadium, showcasing a focus on sports and entertainment sectors.

item.title: S
item.description: score:-33 Chances: SentinelOne raises full-year forecast, adds partnership with Wiz still on SentinelOne Announces Second Quarter Fiscal Year 2024 Financial Results SentinelOne Leads the Way in XDR SentinelOne and Netskope Team to Secure Modern Workforce SentinelOne Stock: Bull vs. Bear Risks: SentinelOne scraps Wiz partnership nearly a week after bid interest SentinelOne Might Be Up for Sale – What Should You Do if You Own the Stock?
